text: 10.16 Mat 26.26-28, Mak 14.22-24, Luk 22.19-20, Apo 2.42, 2.46 Ñɨg kɨnag God agek mɨdtep gup ak dɨl, God nop tep agɨl ñɨbun ak, ñɨg wayn kɨnag mɨgan anɨb ak ñɨbun won ak chɨnop gek, chɨn jɨmñɨl mɨdɨl Klays nɨkɨm ne chɨnop nen sogak ak ayɨp jɨmñɨl mɨdobun. Pen bilet tɨpagɨpun ak, ñɨbun won ak chɨnop gek, chɨn jɨmñɨl mɨdɨl Klays mubwak ne ayɨp jɨmñɨl mɨdobun.
